name: create_reminder
description: Creates a new reminder, which must be scheduled for the present or a future time.

title.description: The title of the reminder, which serves as a short description of its purpose.

description.description: A more detailed explanation or supplemental information about the reminder.

start_date.description: The scheduled date for the reminder, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`. This date must be the current date or a future date.

time_of_day.description: The scheduled time for the reminder, which must be provided in `hh:mm:ss` format.

am_pm_or_unknown.description: Specifies the period of the day, which must be one of "AM", "PM", or "UNKNOWN".

end_date.description: The end date for a recurring reminder, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`. This date must be on or after the `start_date`.

repeat_every_n.description: The number of intervals between each reminder recurrence, used with `repeat_interval_unit`. Defaults to 0, which signifies a non-recurring reminder.

repeat_interval_unit.description: The time unit for the recurrence interval. Must be one of `MINUTE`, `HOUR`, `DAY`, `WEEK`, `MONTH`, or `YEAR`.

days_of_week.description: A list of days for a recurring reminder. Each day must be one of the following: `SUNDAY`, `MONDAY`, `TUESDAY`, `WEDNESDAY`, `THURSDAY`, `FRIDAY`, or `SATURDAY`.

weeks_of_month.description: Specifies the weeks of the month for recurring reminders. Must be a list containing one or more of the following values: `FIRST`, `SECOND`, `THIRD`, `FOURTH`, or `LAST`.

days_of_month.description: Specifies the days of the month for a recurring reminder. Values must be a list containing strings from `DAY_1` to `DAY_31`, or `LAST` to schedule the reminder on the final day of the month.

occurrence_count.description: The total number of times a recurring reminder should occur.

name: get_reminders
description: Retrieves reminders based on a combination of search criteria, such as a text query, a date range, and status filters for completion, recurrence, or deletion.

query.description: A search query string used to filter for reminders by matching text.

from_date.description: The start date for the filter range, which must be a string formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`.

from_time_of_day.description: Filters reminders, including only those that occur at or after the specified time. Must be a string in `hh:mm:ss` format.

to_date.description: The end date for the search range, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`. This date cannot be earlier than the specified `from_date`.

to_time_of_day.description: The end time of day for the filter, which must be provided as a string in `hh:mm:ss` format.

include_completed.description: Specifies whether to include completed reminders in the results. Defaults to `False`, meaning they are excluded.

is_recurring.description: Specifies whether to filter results to include only recurring reminders.

include_deleted.description: Specifies whether to include deleted reminders in the search results. By default, deleted reminders are excluded.

name: modify_reminder
description: Searches for and modifies existing reminders. You must identify which reminders to update by providing either a list of `reminder_ids` or a `retrieval_query`.

reminder_ids.description: A list of unique string IDs for the reminders to modify. At least one of `reminder_ids` or `retrieval_query` must be provided.

query.description: A keyword-based search query used to find the reminders to modify.

from_date.description: The start date for the search query, which must be a string formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`.

to_date.description: The end date for the search query, which must be a string formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`.

from_time_of_day.description: The start time for the search filter, specified in `hh:mm:ss` format.

to_time_of_day.description: The end time for the search query's time range, filtering for reminders scheduled at or before this time. This value must be in `hh:mm:ss` format.

include_completed.description: Specifies whether to include reminders marked as completed in the search query.

is_recurring.description: A boolean filter to retrieve only recurring reminders, excluding all single-event reminders from the search results.

retrieval_query.description: A dictionary of search criteria to find reminders to modify. Keys include `query` (keywords), `from_date`/`to_date` (YYYY-MM-DD), `from_time_of_day`/`to_time_of_day` (hh:mm:ss), `include_completed` (boolean), and `is_recurring` (boolean).

completed.description: A boolean that marks the targeted reminders as completed when set to `True`.

deleted.description: Specifies whether to mark the targeted reminders as deleted.

is_bulk_mutation.description: Specifies if the modification is a bulk operation that applies to multiple reminders.

title.description: A new title for the reminder or reminders. This title cannot be overly generic or consist solely of date and time information.

description.description: Specifies the new description for the reminder or reminders being modified.

start_date.description: The reminder's new start date, which must be a string formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`.

time_of_day.description: The new time for the reminder, which must be a string formatted as `hh:mm:ss`.

am_pm_or_unknown.description: The time period for the reminder, which must be specified as "AM", "PM", or "UNKNOWN".

end_date.description: The new end date for recurring reminders, specified in YYYY-MM-DD format.

repeat_every_n.description: The numeric frequency for the new recurrence interval. This value is paired with `repeat_interval_unit` to define how often the reminder repeats (e.g., a value of `2` for every two weeks).

repeat_interval_unit.description: The new unit of time for the reminder's recurrence interval, used in conjunction with `repeat_every_n` to set the repetition frequency.

days_of_week.description: A list of strings specifying the new days of the week for the reminder's recurrence schedule.

weeks_of_month.description: A list of strings specifying the weeks of the month for the reminder's recurrence schedule.

days_of_month.description: A list of strings representing the new days of the month for the reminder's recurrence schedule.

occurrence_count.description: The total number of times a recurring reminder should occur. This value determines when the series of repetitions will end.

name: show_matching_reminders
description: Searches for and shows matching reminders. When using `reminder_ids`, deleted reminders are included; when using `retrieval_query`, deleted reminders are excluded by default unless `include_deleted` is set to `True`.

reminder_ids.description: A non-empty list of specific reminder IDs to retrieve. Results will include any matching reminders, even those that have been deleted.

query.description: A keyword search query used to find matching reminders.

from_date.description: The start date for the search query, which must be formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`.

to_date.description: The end date for the search range, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`.

from_time_of_day.description: The start time for the search query, which must be provided in `hh:mm:ss` format.

to_time_of_day.description: The end time for the search filter. This must be a string formatted as `hh:mm:ss`.

include_completed.description: Specifies whether to include reminders marked as completed in the search results.

is_recurring.description: A boolean flag that, when set to `true`, returns only recurring reminders.

include_deleted.description: Specifies whether to include deleted reminders in the search results. By default, deleted reminders are excluded.

retrieval_query.description: A dictionary of search criteria to find reminders. Supported keys include `query`, `from_date` (YYYY-MM-DD), `to_date` (YYYY-MM-DD), `from_time_of_day` (hh:mm:ss), `to_time_of_day` (hh:mm:ss), `include_completed`, `is_recurring`, and `include_deleted`.

name: undo
description: Reverts reminder operations performed during the last turn of the conversation.

undo_operation_ids.description: A list of IDs for the operations to undo. Each ID must be a string.
